texts.name: Fossil Machine Skull Convoy (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 Rock-Type monster in your Graveyard + 1 Level 7 or higher Machine-Type monster in your opponent's Graveyard
Must be Special Summoned with "Fossil Fusion". While your opponent controls a monster, this card can attack up to 3 times during each Battle Phase. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

(This card is always treated as a "Paleozoic" card.)

texts.name: Time Stream (VG)
texts.desc:
Pay half your LP, then target 1 monster you control named "Fossil Warrior Skull Bone" or "Fossil Warrior Skull Knight"; return it to the Extra Deck. Special Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck based on the monster you returned.
● "Fossil Warrior Skull Bone": "Fossil Warrior Skull Knight"
● "Fossil Warrior Skull Knight": "Fossil Warrior Skull King"
(This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

texts.name: Fossil Warrior Skull Knight (VG)
texts.desc:
1 Rock-Type monster in your Graveyard + 1 Level 5 or 6 monster in your opponent's Graveyard.
Must be Special Summoned with "Fossil Fusion", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. While your opponent controls a monster, this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

texts.name: Fossil Dragon Skullgios (VG)
texts.desc:
1 Rock-Type monster in your Graveyard + 1 Level 8 or higher monster in your opponent's Graveyard
Must be Special Summoned with "Fossil Fusion". Before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can switch the current ATK and DEF of that opponent's monster until the end of that Damage Step. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

texts.name: TBR - Tellus the Little Angel
texts.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon 1 "Tellus Wing Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).

texts.name: Shell Knight (Anime)
texts.desc: When this card is Summoned: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: To be overhaulled - Magical Hats (Anime)
texts.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 face-up Spellcaster-Type monster you control; Special Summon as many "Hat Tokens" (ATK 0/DEF 0) or Spell/Trap Card(s) from your Deck as possible in face-down Defense Position, Set the targeted monster, and shuffle them on the field. If a Spell or Trap Card you control is attacked and flipped face-up: Activate that Spell or Trap Card.
